document_data.caption: A map showing Luirenstrand south of mainland Luiren.
document_data.name: Luirenstrand
document_data.mainbody: '''Luirenstrand''', also known as '''Hambone Bay'''<ref>, was a bay and coastline in the [[Great Sea]] that formed one of the borders of [[Luiren]].
